author: bjtucker
body:
Created an ubuntu 16.04 dockerfile which builds powershell from source within.

To operate, from within the source directory: 

```
docker build -t powershell_buildimage -f Dockerfile_build .
```

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@bjtucker**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
We appreciate the contribution @bjtucker, but had further requirements we had to fulfill (for instance, covering all of our supported distributions, not just Ubuntu 16.04).

Thank you, but I'm closing in favor of #2220.

comments.author: bjtucker
comments.body: I think a pull request was premature, but I hope my work here is helpful to the effort. Obviously, feel free to use any parts of it that are useful.

title: Add Dockerized build environment
